about.intro: I'm a Software Engineer specializing in MERN stack development, currently pursuing a BSc in Computer Science at BRAC University while working as a Junior Software Engineer at Fatmonk Studio.
about.details: My journey in tech began with frontend development and has since evolved into full-stack engineering, where I craft scalable, high-performance applications from concept to deployment. I've built and contributed to SaaS platforms, POS systems, headless e-commerce solutions, analytics dashboards, workflow automation tools, and custom CRM systems, focusing on creating seamless, efficient, and maintainable digital experiences that drive business impact. I specialize in React, Next.js, Node.js, Nest.js, and modern web technologies, with a strong emphasis on clean architecture, scalability, and performance optimization. My development approach blends best practices in API design, modular architecture, and cloud-native deployment to ensure reliability and maintainability at scale.
about.philosophy: I believe in clean code, continuous learning, and delivering projects on time with uncompromising quality. Every project is an opportunity to solve real-world problems through technology, and I'm passionate about building products that make a meaningful impact.

projects.title: Fleeting Commerce ‚Äî White Label E-commerce SaaS
projects.description: Designed and developed a multi-tenant white-label e-commerce SaaS platform enabling businesses to launch fully branded online stores. Implemented domain-based storefront rendering, theme customization, subscription management, and secure payment integration, ensuring scalability, tenant isolation, and production-grade performance.
projects.problem: Small businesses struggle to launch branded online stores without expensive custom development or being locked into rigid marketplace templates.
projects.solution: Built a multi-tenant SaaS platform where each business gets a fully branded storefront rendered via domain-based routing, with theme customization, subscription tiers, and integrated payments ‚Äî all managed from a single admin dashboard.
challenges: Designing tenant isolation to prevent data leaks between storefronts
Implementing domain-based routing for dynamic storefront rendering
Building a flexible theme engine that supports deep customization
Handling subscription billing and payment gateway integration securely

projects.title: Simply Gaines
projects.description: Collaborated with a USA-based client to build a multi-role platform for Agencies, Organizations, and Contributors. Implemented role-based onboarding enabling agencies to manage clients, teams, employees, and contributors. Built workflows for projects, campaigns, brand management, and team collaboration. Integrated social media management (Facebook, X) and cloud storage services (Google Drive, OneDrive, Dropbox), and contributed to dual marketplaces for tools/templates and contributor hiring.
projects.problem: Agencies lacked a unified platform to manage clients, teams, campaigns, and contributor hiring ‚Äî forcing them to juggle multiple disconnected tools.
projects.solution: Created a multi-role platform with role-based onboarding, project/campaign workflows, social media integrations, cloud storage connectors, and dual marketplaces for tools and contributors.
challenges: Designing a flexible role-based access control system for multiple user types
Integrating multiple social media APIs (Facebook, X) with varying authentication flows
Building a dual marketplace with separate listing and discovery logic
Coordinating with a remote USA-based client across time zones

projects.solution: Built a cross-platform React Native app with audio-only streaming, background playback, playlist management, and offline download support using Expo.
challenges: Extracting and streaming audio-only from YouTube sources
Implementing background audio playback on both iOS and Android
Managing offline downloads and local storage efficiently
Handling platform-specific differences in audio APIs

questions.question: What does the 'use strict' directive do in JavaScript?
options: Enables strict mode with stricter parsing
questions.explanation: 'use strict' enables strict mode, which catches common coding mistakes and prevents the use of certain error-prone features.

questions.question: Which HTTP method is idempotent?
questions.explanation: PUT is idempotent ‚Äî making the same PUT request multiple times produces the same result. POST creates new resources each time.

questions.question: What is the output of: typeof null?
questions.explanation: This is a famous JavaScript quirk ‚Äî typeof null returns 'object' due to a legacy bug in the language specification.

questions.question: What does CORS stand for?
questions.explanation: CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) is a security mechanism that allows servers to specify which origins can access their resources.

questions.question: In React, what hook replaces componentDidMount in functional components?
questions.explanation: useEffect with an empty dependency array [] runs once after the initial render, equivalent to componentDidMount.

questions.question: What is the time complexity of accessing an element in a hash map?
questions.explanation: Hash maps provide O(1) average-case access time through hashing, though worst case can be O(n) with many collisions.

questions.question: Which SQL command is used to remove a table entirely?
questions.explanation: DROP TABLE removes the table structure and all its data permanently. DELETE only removes rows.

questions.question: What does the 'virtual DOM' in React do?
options: Runs code in a virtual machine
Creates a lightweight copy of the real DOM for efficient diffing
Compiles JSX to HTML at build time
questions.explanation: The virtual DOM is an in-memory representation of the real DOM. React diffs the virtual DOM to minimize actual DOM updates.
